text: Pete Sampras was the defending champion but did not participate in this edition. Patrick McEnroe won in the final 6-2, 7-6(7-4) against Richard Fromberg. ==Seeds== A champion seed is indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which that seed was eliminated. # Marc Rosset (First Round) # Andrei Medvedev (Second Round) # Thomas Muster (First Round) # Richard Krajicek (Quarterfinals) # Petr Korda (First Round) # Jacco Eltingh (First Round) # Andrea Gaudenzi (Semifinals) # Karel Nováček (Second Round) ==Draw== ==References== * 1995 Peters International Draw Men's Singles Singles
title: 1995 Peters International – Men's Singles
